duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast, friendly service to customers, including executing food program.
Lead a team of employees, recruit, interview, hire, delegate, follow-up, train, motivate, and plan and organize tasks.
Handle cash, resolve customer issues, and advocate for safety and security.
Monitor, stock, rotate, and display product areas to ensure freshness, appeal, and easy customer access.
Ensure all shift sales are completed in accordance with company policies, keep accurate cash, sales, payroll, and inventory control records, and oversee the activities of store employees.
Assist in maintaining a safe environment for employees and customers and protecting company assets.
Prepare and submit daily bookkeeping, invoicing, and gasoline data, and attend job-related meetings.
Perform all duties with minimal supervision and complete daily store reports and other duties as assigned by the Store Manager.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma (or equivalent) and 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred. Knowledge of basic business and customer service principles, as well as planning and organizing, resource management, and leadership skills. A valid driver’s license and dependable transportation required. High School Diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred. Knowledge of basic business and customer service principles, including planning and organizing, resource management, and leadership skills. A valid driver’s license and dependable transportation required.
